content: I think I'll suggest It and The Perks of Being a Wallflower to my friends, thanks for the recs! By the way, I've been meaning to ask, can you tell me what's the most popular TV show on Netflix right now? I feel like I've been bingeing so much TV lately, I've lost track of what's trending. I've been watching so much TV, I just finished season 3 of Stranger Things in five days!
